choices.text:
### System:
You are an AI assistant that follows instruction extremely well. Help as much as you can.

### User:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company

### Response:


Dear [Boss's Name],

I hope this message finds you in good health and high spirits. As per our previous conversation, I would like to inform you that [Your name] will be leaving the company on [Date]. The reason for her departure is [Reason].

We have discussed the transition process and agreed upon a timeline for handing over responsibilities. We are confident that [Name of coworker] will take care of everything smoothly, and there won't be any disruption in the work flow.

Please let me know if you need anything further from us. Thank you for your understanding and support throughout her tenure with our company.

Best regards,
[Your name]
